nodes.text: Otoforli was a male Rutian Twi'lek merchant who lived on Coruscant during the Cold War with the resurgent Sith Empire.

A Twi'lek male, Otoforli lived on the planet of Coruscant where he worked in the Commerce Hall below the Senate Building during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire.
Otoforli appears in the BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic as a specialty goods vendor on Coruscant.
